dict.acceptation: 折痕；信徒；羊栏；（起伏地的）凹处，洼；

sent.orig: Fanfold: Also called Accordion fold, Concertina fold, Over and back fold, Zigzag fold.
sent.trans: 扇形摺：亦称风琴摺，之字摺。

sent.orig: Fold dough over filling, forming a triangle. Fold triangle up, then fold over, forming another triangle.
sent.trans: 把右下角的面皮翻上来，盖住馅，成一三角形。再折一下，成另一三角形。

sent.orig: Over and back fold: Also called Accordion fold, Zigzag fold.
sent.trans: 之字折：亦称风琴折，扇形折。

sent.orig: Anticline and syncline, geometrical elements of fold, description and recognition of fold in the field.
sent.trans: 背斜和向斜、褶皱的几何要素、褶皱的描述和褶皱的野外描述。

sent.orig: Fold but do not fold a right-angled triangle the intermediate is not it?
sent.trans: 不用对折而是把中间折叠成直角三角形是么？
